'''Fastolph Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].
==History==
Fastolp was the son of [[Rudolph Bolger]] and [[Cora Goodbody]]. He married [[Pansy Baggins]] and had various descendants.<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref><ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Composed from ''fast'' "firm" and ''wulf'' "wolf.<ref>[[Jim Allan]], ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
